meanings.definition: Showing or reflecting an iridescent light
meanings.sent1: The soap bubbles looked opalescent in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The lake shimmered with an opalescent glow at dawn.
meanings.sent3: The opalescent clouds seemed to dance in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her opalescent dress was like a rainbow in motion.
meanings.sent5: The opalescent gem sparkled with a magical sheen.

meanings.sent1: The opalescent moon cast a soft light over the garden.
meanings.sent2: The opalescent seashell glistened on the sandy beach.
meanings.sent3: The opalescent milkshake was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her opalescent eyes held a mysterious allure.
meanings.sent5: The opalescent pearl gleamed with a pearly sheen.

meanings.definition: Exhibiting a play of colors like that of the opal
meanings.sent1: The opalescent gemstone displayed a range of hues.
meanings.sent2: The opalescent soap bubbles floated in the air.
meanings.sent3: The opalescent painting was a masterpiece of colors.
meanings.sent4: Her opalescent necklace shimmered with elegance.
meanings.sent5: The opalescent butterfly fluttered gracefully in the garden.
